name: appraisily-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Appraisily website and services

scripts.build:main: cd main_page && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:directory: cd art-appraiser-directory-frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run apply-patches && npm run build:main && npm run build:directory && node scripts/merge-builds.js
